name: UNiagaraAssetTagDefinitions
doc: An asset to define multiple tag definitions; used to sort and categorize Niagara assets.

DisplayName: The display name to use when listing this asset in the Niagara Asset Browser
Description: A description for this group of tags. Used for tooltips.
bDisplayTagsAsFlatList: If true, no 'parent' entry for this asset will be displayed in the Niagara Asset Browser. Instead a flat list of the contained tags will be added.
SortOrder: Tags are sorted by asset sort order first, then individually. That means tags of asset with sort order [0] come before tags of asset with sort order [1].
